The great WC Fields was once asked what he would like on his epitaph,

translation.en: I know Philadelphia because I grew up in New York,

translation.en: and I think my first trip was to the Franklin Institute in fifth grade.

translation.en: And then I met a girl who grew up right outside of Philadelphia,

translation.en: and she seemed pretty good, so I married her.
That was 32 years ago.
And I've been coming back ever since to see Monica's family and to just visit

translation.en: They call it the City of Brotherly Love.
